message: I propose we divide the $10000 with an 80/20 split in favor of you, Bob. This should ensure a fair distribution considering the diminishing value of money in subsequent rounds.

I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. This is a fairer split considering the devaluation of money in each round. I believe this is a good deal for both of us, as it allows us to each get a significant portion of the money.
